# Preface {-}

This guide has been developed based on examples of replatforming analytical models predominantly from Excel into R within the Department for Education.  It is intended to be a living document so if you have any comments or suggestions please contact the [Model Improvement and Assurance Unit](modellingandqa@Educationgovuk.onmicrosoft.com).  Comments and suggestions will be reviewed by the QA Working Group.
